name: The Running Dead (Lizzie)
description:
The Running Dead is a group project for one of my second-year courseworks. This is a 2D endless-runner game developed in Unity, where the player must collect items for points and avoid obstacles so you don't get caught by the zombies!

Check out the "How to Play" option in the game to learn more about the pick-ups, power-ups and obstacles.

Controls

  • Move left - A
  • Move right - D
  • Jump - SPACE
  • Drop bomb - ENTER/RETURN
  • Pause - ESCAPE

Credits

Lizzie Briggs - Programming

Jaime Herd - Programming, sprites and animations

Clement Smith - Programming
